text: Prabhatham Chuvanna Theruvil is a 1989 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by N. P. Suresh, starring Ratheesh and Anuradha.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_prabhatham-chuvanna- theruvil.htm ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * Innocent * Ratheesh * Anuradha * Chithra * Janardanan * Jayamalini * Lalithasree * Mala Aravindan * T. title: Prabhatham Chuvanna Theruvil
